title: View Transition
description: CSS View Transitions API utilities for smooth page navigation. Enabled by default; unsupported browsers work normally.

sections.title: Static elements
sections.description: Elements that persist without animation. Sidebar and header stay fixed during page transitions.

sections.title: Slide animations
sections.description: Content slides in/out in different directions.

examples.code:
<main class="ui-transition-name-main">Slides up</main>
<main class="ui-transition-name-slide-up">Slides up</main>
<main class="ui-transition-name-slide-down">Slides down</main>
<main class="ui-transition-name-slide-start">Slides from left</main>
<main class="ui-transition-name-slide-end">Slides from right</main>

sections.title: Scale and fade
sections.description: Scale effect for modals/cards, fade for subtle transitions.

examples.code:
Scales in/out
Card scales
Modal scales
Fades in/out

sections.title: Hero morph
sections.description: Same element on both pages morphs (position/size interpolates). Use same class on source and target.

sections.title: Disable
sections.description: Exclude an element from view transitions.
